meanings.definition: The quality or state of being different.
meanings.sent1: The differentnesses of the two flowers were easy to spot.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained the concept of differentnesses using various examples.
meanings.sent3: The differentnesses of the twins always confused their friends.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of similarities, her differentnesses shone brightly.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the differentnesses of each snowflake in the painting.

meanings.definition: The fact of being dissimilar or distinct.
meanings.sent1: The differentnesses in their personalities made them a perfect match.
meanings.sent2: The differentnesses between the two species fascinated the biologist.
meanings.sent3: The differentnesses in their tastes led to interesting culinary adventures.
meanings.sent4: His differentnesses from the rest of the team made him stand out.
meanings.sent5: The differentnesses in their approaches to problem-solving were evident.

meanings.definition: The state of being unlike or distinct from others.
meanings.sent1: The differentnesses of her opinions sparked a lively debate.
meanings.sent2: The artist's work celebrated the differentnesses of each individual.
meanings.sent3: The differentnesses in their fashion choices always turned heads.
meanings.sent4: His differentnesses in thinking outside the box impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The differentnesses in their personalities complemented each other perfectly.
